sentences.en: An optimist is a girl who mistake a bulge for a curve.
sentences.cn: 乐观的人,等于是把(自己身体上)凸出来的部分也错认作曲线的女孩子.

sentences.en: An optimist laughs to forget a pessimist forgets to laugh.
sentences.cn: 乐观主义者笑着忘记,悲观主义者却忘记了笑.

sentences.en: An optimist sees the rose a pessimist sees the thorn.
sentences.cn: 乐观的人看到玫瑰,悲观的人只能看到刺.

sentences.en: Bailey had always been an optimist , a sound Marxian optimist.
sentences.cn: 贝利向来是个乐天派, 是个十足的马克思主义乐天派.

sentences.en: Bailey had always been an optimist.
He's such an optimist that he's sure he'll soon find a job.
sentences.cn: 他很乐观,认为自己一定很快就能找到工作.

sentences.en: He’s an eternal optimist (= he always believes that good things will happen ).
sentences.cn: 他是个永远的乐观主义者。

sentences.en: Know the difference between a pessimist and an optimist?
sentences.cn: 知道乐观派和悲观派之间有什么不同 吗 ?

sentences.en: No leader worthy of the name ever existed But was an optimist.
sentences.cn: 名副其实的领导人,历来都是乐观主义者.

sentences.en: Only a foolish optimist can deny the dark realities of the moment.
sentences.cn: 只有愚蠢的乐观主义者才会否认当今的凄惨现实.

sentences.en: Pete, ever the optimist, said things were bound to improve.
sentences.cn: 一向乐观的皮特说,事情必定是会好转的.

sentences.en: The little Optimist we bought in NZ is finally commissioned!
sentences.cn: 我们在纽西兰买的二手小艇终于下水!

sentences.en: The man who is a pessimist before forty - eight knows too much; the man who is an optimist after forty - eight knows too little.
sentences.cn: 未逾 四十八 岁的悲观主义者,是知道得太多之人; 而年逾 四十八 岁的乐观主义者,是知道得太少之人.
我们是乐观主义者,又是现实主义者.

sentences.en: Which are you – an optimist or a realist?
sentences.cn: 你是哪一种?乐观主义者还是现实主义者?

sentences.en: You are either very young or an incurable optimist.
sentences.cn: 你要么非常年轻，要么是个不可救药的乐天派。

trans.tran_en: someone who believes that good things will happen
